mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER.MEMBERTYPE, MEMBER.NAME, MEMBER.EMAIL, MEMBER.PHONE, MEMBER.GRADE, MEMBER.CREDIT_HISTORY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER.MEMID = #{memId} AND MEMBER.PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, GRADE, MEMTYPE) VALUES (#{memId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{grade}, #{memberType})
INSERT INTO credit(credit_id, purpose, amount, credit_date, memId) VALUES(credit_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{purpose}, #{amount}, sysDate, #{member.memId})
